install.name: Twitter Feed
install.author: Christopher Smoak
install.copyright: Copyright 2005-2009 by Purdue Research Foundation, West Lafayette, IN 47906
install.description: Loads the Twitter feed of the specified Twitter ID

param.name: moduleTitle
param.default: GET VIRTUAL HIGHLIGHTS ON NANOEHS ARTICLES
param.label: Module Title Text
param.description: The title of the module block.

param.name: twitterID
param.label: Twitter ID
param.description: The Twitter ID of the Twitter account to be displayed.

param.name: tweetcount
param.label: Tweet Count
param.description: The number of latest Tweets to display.

param.name: displayLink
param.label: Display Link To Twitter
param.description: To display link to Twitter account page.

param.name: displayIcon
param.label: Display Twitter Icon
param.description: To display a Twitter icon next to link to Twitter page.
